text:
"You naughty boy!" Ben Shephard in giggles on GMB after cheeky quip about looking for Great tits at the weekend Viewers left laughing after a segment on bird watching takes a mischievous turn Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ben Shephard dissolved into giggles on today’s Good Morning Britain after a cheeky joke about birdwatching at the weekend. 
The presenter had viewers in peals of laughter after making a quip about hunting for Great tits at the weekend - those of the bird, variety, that is… 
Ben started the chat with a straight face, saying it was an important weekend for bird watching as the Royal Society For The Protection Of Birds wanted people to go out and observe birds in their garden and report back. An innocent birdwatching segment took a turn for the worse (Photo: ITV) Ben couldn't stop giggling (Photo: ITV) 
Photos of various bird varieties to watch out for then flashed up on screen, prompting Ben to say: “That’s a little Blue tit, isn’t it?” 
When corrected that it was actually a Great tit, he said: “That’s the Great tit? They all look like Great tits to me. I don’t know them very well…” 
His quip was enough to set viewers off and they took to social media in droves to thank Ben for the chuckle and assure him they would indeed be looking out for Great tits this weekend. Viewers said Ben had made them chuckle with his joke (Photo: ITV) 
One joked: “I will also be "bird" watching this weekend! And like you said, looking for "great tits" as well!” 
Another said: “What's wrong with you this morning lol. I know what you are thinking lol. You naughty boy.” 
A third said: “Ben your such a cheeky chap & you make me laugh on this cold morning (sic)." 
Another viewer simply said: "Naughty Ben...funny though." Kate Garraway says Ben gets naughtier as the week goes on (Photo: ITV) 
Ben broke down in giggles after the comment, leaving co-hosts Charlotte Hawkins and Kate Garraway smiling. 
Kate told Charlotte: “You don’t normally experience this. basically Ben’s mischievous goes up exponentially during the week. He’s about 60 per cent sensible on Monday, and now it’s 110 per cent naughty.”
